noncompliance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":73654,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7fe2de71-5190-4175-8577-5cb7444d06ef/Picture14.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7fe2de71-5190-4175-8577-5cb7444d06ef/Picture14.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture14.png\",\"name\":\"Picture14.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7fe2de71-5190-4175-8577-5cb7444d06ef\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":615,\"height\":300},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Without programs to prevent, detect, and correct noncompliance, we are all at risk from delayed services, denial of benefits, difficulty in using providers of choice, and other hurdles to essential health care.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But that is not all. Because there is a trickledown effect from noncompliance, there is less money for everyone, due to high insurance copayments, higher premiums, lower benefits for individuals and employers, lower Star ratings, and therefore, lower profits.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This makes compliance everyone’s responsibility.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":21892,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4f253882-7ea3-44cc-a08d-d5978260028f/Capture13.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4f253882-7ea3-44cc-a08d-d5978260028f/Capture13.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture13.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture13.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4f253882-7ea3-44cc-a08d-d5978260028f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1026,\"height\":314},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What noncompliance is detected and corrected, an ongoing evaluation process is critical to ensure the noncompliance does not recur, including monitoring and auditing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitoring activities are regular reviews which confirm ongoing compliance and ensure that corrective actions are undertaken and effective.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Auditing is a formal review of compliance with a set of standards (e.g., policies and procedures, laws and regulations) used as base
